input.sentences: we went to a local art show . several artists were there . including the artist who made these beaded tops and hats .
several medims were used to make this . i think it looks like a peacock .
the time it must take to make this plate is astounding .
these tiny little pots were adorable .
my favorite was this hand made hammock . the colors are bright .
output.sentences: There are lots of great finds at the local carnival
Not everything at the carnival are costumes some are also had made craft baskets
Local artist make one of a kind trinkets and sell their crafts at the local markets and carnivals.
Some of these pieces can be very pricey. but they are worth every penny
